_header: To speak of gifts of almsdeeds
_description: William Dunbar, ‘Of discretioun in geving’ — twelve 5-line stanzas with refrain, ‘In geving sowld discretioun be’

CULLl510.First Lines:
To speik of giftis oure almous deidissum giffis for mereit and sum
                    for meidis…
CULLl510.Last Lines:
…that hes na witt þame to gydIn giffing sould discretioun
                    be
CULLl510.Note:
11 x 5, aabab, incl. refrain, ‘In giffing sould discretioun
                    be’; first stanza treated as if last of 4161, with wrong refrain.

CamMagPep2553.First Lines:
To speik of giftis or almous deidisSum giffis for mereit and sum
                    for meidis…
CamMagPep2553.Last Lines:
…That hes na witt þame selffe to gydeIn giffing sould
                    discretioun be
CamMagPep2553.Note:
Missing lines 30-35; no separation between this and preceding 4161 nor between this and
                    following 402.

             2 vols. 
             Scottish Text Society
         n.s. 7 (1919), 20 (1927); Edinburgh and London: Blackwood, 1919,
            1927: 1.290-2.

Banna.First Lines:
To speik of gift or almous deidisSum gevis for mereit and for
                    meidis…
Banna.Last Lines:
…that he na wit hes thame to gydIn geving sowld discretioun
                    be
Banna.Attributed Title:
ffollowis discretioun of geving (f. 61v); ffinis of discretioun
                    of geving (f. 62v)
